title: Interactive Reflexology Quiz Website with Notes-Based Questions

requirements.text: Build a Motoko backend that stores all quiz questions as structured data. Each question must include: question text (in Malay), four multiple-choice answer options, the correct answer index, a topic category, and an explanation. Seed the backend with questions derived from the provided notes on sections 3.0 (What is Pain?), 4.0 (Causes of Body Disorders/Disease), and 4.1 (Identifying Disease Symptoms). Questions to include: (1) What does 'pain' mean in reflexology? (2) Which of the following is an example of an external disturbance? (3) Which of the following is an example of an internal disturbance? (4) How do both external and internal disturbances affect the body? (5) How does a reflexologist identify a problem organ using reflexology zones? (6) What does it indicate if pressing a reflexology point causes severe pain and noticeable swelling? (7) What does it indicate if pressing a reflexology point causes no pain and no swelling? (8) What should a practitioner do before performing hand reflexology on a client? (9) How often should reflexology treatment be repeated for best results? (10) Which condition is considered EASY to treat with hand reflexology techniques? (11) Which condition is considered DIFFICULT to treat with hand reflexology? (12) What does it mean if a reflexology pressure point is only mildly painful when pressed?

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores at least 12 MCQ questions seeded from the provided notes
Each question has a text, four options, correct answer index, topic category, and explanation
Backend exposes query functions to retrieve all questions and submit/score answers
Questions are categorized under topics matching the note sections (e.g., 'What is Pain?', 'Causes of Disease', 'Identifying Symptoms')

requirements.text: Build an interactive quiz frontend that fetches questions from the backend and presents them one at a time. Each question displays four answer choices. After the user selects an answer, immediately show whether it was correct or incorrect along with the explanation. Allow navigation to the next question. At the end of the quiz, display a summary screen showing total score (e.g., 9/12), percentage, and a performance message. Include a 'Restart Quiz' button to retake the quiz.

quotes: Kuiz interaktif dengan soalan pelbagai pilihan (MCQ)
Sistem markah dan keputusan di akhir kuiz
Maklum balas jawapan betul/salah selepas setiap soalan

acceptanceCriteria: Questions are displayed one at a time with four selectable answer options
Correct/incorrect feedback with explanation is shown immediately after answering
Progress indicator shows current question number out of total (e.g., Question 3 of 12)
Final score screen shows score, percentage, and a message based on performance
Restart Quiz button resets and reshuffles the quiz

requirements.text: Apply a clean, professional, and calming visual theme across the entire application. Use warm, health-inspired tones (e.g., soft greens, creams, or warm neutrals) with clear sans-serif typography. The layout should feel like a modern e-learning platform — with a prominent quiz card centered on the page, a visible topic header, animated transitions between questions, and highlighted answer states (green for correct, red for incorrect).

quotes: Antara muka menarik yang mudah digunakan

acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette using warm, health-inspired tones applied throughout
Quiz card is centered and visually distinct from the background
Correct answers highlighted in green, incorrect in red after selection
Typography is clear and readable on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Add a topic filter or category selector on a home/landing screen so users can choose to quiz on a specific topic (e.g., 'What is Pain?', 'Causes of Disease', 'Identifying Symptoms') or take a full mixed quiz covering all topics.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing screen displays available topic categories and a 'Full Quiz' option
Selecting a topic filters questions to only those in that category
Selecting 'Full Quiz' includes all questions from all topics
Selected mode is clearly shown during the quiz session

constraints: All quiz question data must be stored and served from the Motoko backend, not hardcoded in the frontend
All user-facing text in the UI must be in English; quiz question content (derived from notes) may remain in Malay
nonGoals: Saving quiz history or scores per user
Questions about topics not yet provided in notes (e.g., foot or ear reflexology — to be added in future sessions)
